TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EndpointDispatcher extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EndpointDispatcher extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示公开属性的运行时对象，使用这些属性可以在服务应用程序中插入运行时扩展或修改消息。

span.span: Represents the run-time object that exposes properties that enable the insertion of run-time extensions or modifications for messages in service applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 类公开服务中终结点的运行时自定义点。The and the classes expose the runtime customization points for endpoints in a service. 可用于控制它可以处理哪些消息以及某些与终结点相关的信息。The can be used to control which messages it can process and some endpoint-related information. 具有大量的属性，这些属性用于将自定义扩展插入到终结点范围运行时中。The has a large number of properties used to insert custom extensions into the endpoint-wide runtime. 当消息的目标地址与 属性相匹配并且消息操作与 属性相匹配时， 对象负责处理来自 的消息。The object is responsible for processing messages from a when the destination address of a message matches the property and the message action matches the property. 如果两个 对象可以接受一个消息，则 属性值确定具有较高优先级的终结点。If two objects can accept a message, the property value determines the higher priority endpoint. 使用 对象可以配置或扩展从关联的 接收消息、将消息对象转换为用作参数的对象、调用终结点操作的过程，并可以扩展相反的过程。Use the object to configure or extend the process of receiving messages from the associated , converting from message objects to objects used as parameters, and invoking an endpoint operation as well as the reverse process. 通常情况下，终结点的 是通过实现 接口来获取的，不过您可以从其他行为接口访问 。Typically, the for an endpoint is obtained by implementing the interface, but you can access the from the other behavior interfaces. 您可以使用以下 属性：You can use the following properties: - 使用 属性可以获取或设置 对象， 使用该对象来确定终结点是否可以处理特定的消息。The property allows you to get or set a object that the uses to identify whether the endpoint can process a particular message. - 属性获取关联的 对象，该对象可与 相互发送和接收消息，并可用于检查或修改其他与通道相关的值和行为。The property gets the associated object, which sends and receives messages to and from the and which can be used to inspect or modify other channel-related values and behaviors. - 获取 对象，该对象用于确定是否将消息发送到此协定。The gets the object that is used to identify whether a message is destined for this contract. - 和 属性返回终结点协定的名称和命名空间。The and properties return the name and namespace of the endpoint contract. - 属性返回 对象，您可以使用该对象在整个终结点中修改运行时值或插入自定义运行时扩展。The property returns the object that you can use to modify run-time values or insert custom run-time extensions for the entire endpoint. - 属性获取终结点的地址。The property gets the address of the endpoint. - 属性返回复合筛选器的优先级， 使用该优先级来确立由哪个终结点处理消息。The property returns the priority of the composite filter that the uses to establish which endpoint is to handle the message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用 来定位终结点的 ，以及使用终结点行为来插入自定义消息检查器。The following code example shows the use of to locate the for the endpoint and inserts a custom message inspector using an endpoint behavior. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象用于确定是否将特定的消息发送到终结点地址。

span.span: Gets or sets a object that is used to identify whether a particular message is destined for the endpoint address.

value.span: 用于将消息路由到适当的终结点的地址筛选器。

span.span: The address filter used to route the message to the appropriate endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于通道可以支持的每个终结点， 具有一个 。The has an for each endpoint the channel can support. 属性是与消息的目标终结点地址相匹配的 对象。The property is a object that matches the destination endpoint address of the message. 将 值与 值组合在一起，来确定是否将消息路由到此终结点。The combines the value with the value to determine whether to route a message to this endpoint. 在两个匹配的 对象可以处理一个消息的情况下， 属性用于选择一个终结点。In the case where two objects that match can process a message, the property is used to select an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象从通道接收消息，然后使用 、 和 属性来确定由哪个终结点处理消息。The object receives a message from a channel and uses the , , and properties to determine by which endpoint the message is processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是与消息的操作相匹配的 对象。The property is a object that is matched against the action of a message. 将 值与 值组合在一起，来确定是否将消息路由到此终结点。The combines the value with the value to determine whether to route a message to this endpoint. 在两个匹配的 对象可以处理一个消息的情况下， 属性用于选择一个终结点。In the case where two objects that match can process a message, the property is used to select an endpoint.

span.span: The object used to inspect, modify, or extend run-time behavior across a service endpoint or a client callback endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来获取 对象，在整个终结点中修改运行时值或插入自定义运行时扩展。Use the property to obtain the object to modify run-time values or insert custom run-time extensions for the entire endpoint. 您还可以从 属性定位到终结点的 集合。From the property, you can also navigate to the collection for the endpoint. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用 来定位终结点的 ，以及使用终结点行为来插入自定义消息检查器。The following code example shows the use of to locate the for the endpoint and inserts a custom message inspector using an endpoint behavior. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#4)]
